img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is standing in a courtyard area with stone walls and a stone staircase leading upwards. The character is wearing a fur cloak and has horns on their head, holding a staff with a decorative top. There are three large, covered pots or containers in front of the character, one of which is green and the others are brown. The ground is covered with wooden planks and some fallen leaves. The game interface displays various icons and bars, including health or stamina indicators at the bottom left and right corners, along with button prompts labeled "RT" and "LT."
